entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is described as turning steadily more purple in the face while tugging at Crabbe's arms. This indicates that Neville is struggling and trying to free himself from his captor.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is mentioned as being held by Neville, indicating that Crabbe is also a captive in the scene.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as attempting vainly to throw Millicent Bulstrode off her. This indicates that Hermione is trying to defend herself against another student.

entities.name: millicent bulstrode
entities.description: Millicent Bulstrode is mentioned as being thrown by Hermione, indicating that she is also a participant in the struggle.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is described as standing limply by the side of her captor, gazing vaguely out of the window. This indicates that Luna is not actively participating in the struggle.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as looking back at Umbridge, indicating that he is observing the scene and possibly planning his next move.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is described as watching Harry closely, indicating that she is monitoring his behavior and possibly trying to intimidate him.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: Draco Malfoy is mentioned as coming back into the room, holding open the door for Snape. This indicates that Draco is assisting Snape in some way.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is described as looking around at all the pairs of struggling students with an expression of complete indifference. This indicates that Snape is observing the scene but not actively participating.

entities.name: veritaserum
